pages.text:
[Page Title: New Italian Restaurant in Charleston SC | Cane Pazzo]

Welcome to Cane Pazzo

Cane Pazzo is a neighborhood osteria l
ed by Chef/Owner Mark Bolchoz. The menu tells the story of his Southern upbringing combined with his love of Italian cuisine and cooking. 
From handmade pastas to the wood-fired small plates, seafood, and shareable dishes, Cane Pazzo will be reminiscent of the best, old-school Italian style with Lowcountry influence.

Classic Italian flavors by way of Lowcountry ingredients
